levels.description:
Throws an Alchemical Unit. For <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</> seconds, enemies around the landing point take <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage per second, while allied units around the point recover HP equal to <@ba.vup>{hp_recovery_per_sec_ratio:0%}</> ATK per second
<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge</>

<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge</>
